<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Wilding](/Feats.aspx?ID=5075) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 218 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=213)

**Prerequisites**
[Druid Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5073)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [druid feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=52).

<title level="2">Basic Wilding leads to...</title>
[Advanced Wilding](/Feats.aspx?ID=5077)
name: Basic Wilding
